org.zuinnote.hadoop.office.format.common

Class HadoopKeyStoreManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zuinnote.hadoop.office.format.common.HadoopKeyStoreManager

  • public class HadoopKeyStoreManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Load/Store passwords from/to keystore files accessible through Hadoop APIs

      • setPassword

        public void setPassword(java.lang.String alias,
                        java.lang.String password,
                        java.lang.String passwordPassword)
                 throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException,
                        java.security.KeyStoreException
        Sets the password in the currently openend keystore. Do not forget to store it afterwards
        Parameters:
        alias -
        password - to store
        passwordPassword - password for encrypting password. You can use the same as the keystore password
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        java.security.KeyStoreException
